price: ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߘߌߣߵߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߬ߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߜߋ߯ߙߋߞߙߋ ߘߌ߫ ( ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߏ߲ ) ߜߟߋߞߎ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
